plot: Documentary about a group of 20 Brazilian artists called "Atrocidades Maravilhosas" who exhibit their work on big posters in public places in Rio de Janeiro, instead of showing them in museums or art galleries.
title: Atrocidades Maravilhosas
plot_es: Documentary about a group of 20 Brazilian artists called "Atrocidades Maravilhosas" who exhibit their work on big posters in public places in Rio de Janeiro, instead of showing them in museums or art galleries.
plot_en: Documentary about a group of 20 Brazilian artists called "Atrocidades Maravilhosas" who exhibit their work on big posters in public places in Rio de Janeiro, instead of showing them in museums or art galleries.
